document.heading: Board of Education Continuity and Transition Temporary Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-204, the “Board of Education Continuity and Transition Temporary Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-881, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 16, 2004, and June 29, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-478 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-204 became effective on December 7, 2004.
